name: barrier+ Ceramide + Ectoin Hydrating Gentle Gel Cleanser
about: What it is: A pH-balanced cleanser gentle enough for twice-daily use that dissolves SPF, makeup, oil, and pollution while safeguarding skinu2019s barrier and natural lipids...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:- Patented B-L3 Complex: The first biomimetic compound to deliver intense repair to the moisture barrier..- Ectoin: Binds to lipids on skin to keep them in place and protect them from cleansing..- Chamomile: Calms and soothes dry skin after cleansing...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...Our ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency...What Else You Need to Know: This gel-to-foam cleanser can be used in the morning to refresh and prep the skin, and in the evening to clear away SPF, makeup, oil, and environmental impurities without stripping the skin of its natural lipids and fatty acids. The barrier is left intact, leaving skin soft and smooth, while pores appear more refined...Clinical Results: After 1 week in an independent study of 34 subjects ages 18 to 65:.- 94% agreed it thoroughly cleanses without stripping skin.- 93% saw thoroughly cleansed pores and reduced excess oil.- 91% agreed they didn't need to double cleanse..Clean & Planet Aware...Allure
ingredients: -Patented B-L3 Complex: The first biomimetic compound to deliver intense repair to the moisture barrier..-Ectoin: Binds to lipids on skin to keep them in place and protect them from cleansing..-Chamomile: Calms and soothes dry skin after cleansing. ..Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Lauryl Glucoside, Coco-Glucoside, Coconut Acid, Jojoba Oil/Macadamia Seed Oil Esters, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Isethionate, Ectoin, Squalene, Oligopeptide-1, Oligopeptide-2, Oligopeptide-3, Hexapeptide-11, Ceramide EOP, Propanediol, Hydroxyectoin, Niacinamide, Amylopectin, Bacillus/Soybean Fermert Extract, Folic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Inulin, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Lecithin, Acetyl Glutamine, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Lactic Acid, Phytosterols, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Polyglutamic Acid, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol. ..The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Use twice daily: in the morning to gently refresh skin and reinforce skin's barrier, and in the evening massage into wet skin for 60 seconds (dermatologist tip!) to dissolve makeup, impurities, and SPF. Rinse well with lukewarm water and pat dry, follow with serum, moisturizer, and SPF in the morning.

reviews.review_text: This stuff surprised me. I was expecting it to be good for my dry, rosacea skin. It was actually very drying which made my skin even more red. Perhaps it's better suited for people with very oily skin.

reviews.review_text: I'm honestly so surprised this has such rave reviews. I have combo skin (oily/dry) and while this did a decent job at cleansing, it also stripped my skin and made the dryness even worse. I used it a few different times to make sure it wasn't another product in my routine, but it's definitely this cleanser and I won't be using any more of it. Yuck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a solid cleanser. My face feels clean but not dried out. It cuts through my face oil well. Would buy again, but price point is high. I think some drugstore facial cleansers do just as well for half the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Went into Sephora for my usual and was talked into this product. Had to wash my face twice to remive my makeup. Going back to my usual.

reviews.review_title: Love the cleanser, hate the bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix is a reliable, high-performing go-to for my sensitive skin. I swear by multiple products in the line, so I was thrilled when this cleanser was released. It's fantastic. However, even after making certain the bottle is closed, it continues to leak all over my bathroom and has stained my brand new countertop (!!!). This packaging is accessible (twist and click) and such a bonus in that regard, but I cannot have it oozing on my counter. I hope Skinfix will come up with an equally innovative design that doesn't involve this unreliable delivery system.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin and after using this cleanser once or twice, my skin felt extremely stripped and dry which has never happened before. Do not recommend. My skin now burns whenever I try to use my other products because of how much this cleanser stripped my skin barrier of its natural oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After wearing & purchasing SkinFix products for over a year, SkinFix so graciously gifted me some products. This cleanser was one of them. SkinFix is known for having excellent cleansers & this one is certainly no different. The packaging could be better but the product is wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started to do chemical peels on my face and needed a gentle cleanser. I absolutely love this product and have decided to continue using this on a regular basis.

reviews.review_title: Cleanses too well u2014 effective but stripped my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well at removing makeup and SPF, didnu2019t need to double cleanse with it, which is why it has 3 stars and not 2. However I found it stripping and drying. My skin was red in places and felt tight which I didnu2019t love for something thatu2019s supposed to support skin barrier (especially when Iu2019m repairing my barrier to help with acne). The packaging is MISERABLE, it leaks everywhere unless itu2019s sealed super tight and WAY TOO MUCH product comes out every time I used it. Also Iu2019m disappointed that it (and all Skinfix products) uses pore clogging squalene instead of squalane. I used for 10 days and when my skin wasnu2019t adjusting, I stopped using it. Really wanted to love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re looking for a hydrating cleanser for dry skin look no further. This stuff is unreal, I really struggle with face washes stripping my skin and leaving it feeling dry to the touch but this one does not. This leaves my skin feeling plump and hydrated. I cannot say enough great things about this. Even if you donu2019t take any of your makeup off before this you will still get perfectly clean skin. This removes any makeup I have no which is really impressive for a face wash. The packaging might be my favorite part. Itu2019s so innovative and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser, but it does sting my eyes. Iu2019m still going to be using because it truly does an amazing job removing makeup & sunscreen, but be careful near eyes (if sensitive)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin but prefer more gentle cleansers and this removes the excess oil from my skin without leaving my face tight or dry feeling. It doesnu2019t foam up too much and feels nourishing which I like. Only complaint is that the packaging is annoying, you twist the cap and product comes out which gets messy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser wowed me from day one. I bought this three weeks ago and has done such wonders for my combination/sensitive skin. No other cleanser balanced my skin like this does. I will always repurchase. For sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser. I have combination skin and am really really prone to breakouts so Iu2019m always scared to try a new cleanser, but this one was amazing. It didnu2019t irritate my skin at all and after a was my skin felt very hydrated and glowy. I used it after my make up remover. What I like about this brand is it really focuses in the skins barrier with a lot of brands donu2019t empathize on. Iu2019m loving saying this both day and night and have noticed a lot of positive changes in my skin which most noticeably  are itu2019s hydration. Iu2019d recommend this wash to anyone from dry to oily skin I think itu2019s great for any skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Barrier+ Ceramide + Ectoin Hydrating Gentle Gel Cleanser is designed to hydrate and gently cleanse the skin without stripping its natural moisture. It features ceramides and ectoin to strengthen the skin barrier and maintain hydration. Customers appreciate its ability to effectively remove makeup, dirt, and oil while being suitable for sensitive skin. The pH-balanced formula is praised for its soothing properties and leaving the skin feeling soft and clean without tightness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hi my name is Kamila, I am a beauty influencer with non acne prone, non sensitive, combo skin. I recently started using this cleanser and for me to say that I love it would be an understatement. I use it every morning and night for 1 minute and 30 seconds. It is a gentle cleanser that thoroughly cleans the skin without stripping it or damaging its barrier. I love the fact that it has no significant scent because it assures me no extra fragrances were added. It foams a lot and a little bit definitely goes a super long way. I like the fact that it has a hole on the cap so you donu2019t have to struggle getting it open. Over all this cleanser has become one of my favorites very quickly because it doesnu2019t destruct my skin and also hydrated it. I would definitely recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hi, my name is Shannon.  Iu2019ve been a licensed cosmetologist and esthetician for 17 years.  Iu2019ve recently judged the Clean Beauty Awards and Iu2019m a reviewer/content creator on Instagram.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my second opportunity to give Skinfix a try, I was thoroughly impressed with the brand from the first time using their products and receiving education on the brand, being heavily involved in the beauty industry for the past 23 years as a licensed cosmetologist, esthetician and professional makeup artist I am educated in ingredient knowledge and the health of the skin, Skinfix has a patented Bl-3 complex which is a combination of lipids, peptides and vitamins and they have a deep focus on skin barrier health. Using the Expert Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser didn't disappoint, it's a great gel like consistently that only takes a small amount to cleanse the entire face and neck, it doesn't foam or lather up which I personally prefer because that typically means the cleanser is full of sulfates which strip down the skin barrier leaving that tight itchy feeling, this cleanser absolutely does not do that, you can feel the gentleness yet at the same time the cleaning depth it gives. It easily removes makeup, dirt and grime leaving the skin feeling clean and refreshed yet still healthy. It's one of the best cleansers I've had the opportunity to try and could be used on a range of different skin types benefiting all of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s been quite a while since Iu2019ve experienced a cleanser as refreshingly gentle as this one! I know the trend nowadays seems to encourage the use of harsh actives, but this cleanser is proof that most times, our skin will thrive when its basic needs are met. This formula includes ceramides and barrier focused ingredients that help to keep the skin healthy and balanced. Itu2019s very lightweight, non-stripping, and works into a nice lather that leaves my skin feeling fresh. I also love how this formula is effective without the addition of fillers such as fragrances and essential oils. Now, Iu2019m not crazy about the twist top to open the tube because I did experience some leakage which can be a bit of an annoyance. Overall, this would be a nice complement to anyoneu2019s skincare routine whose primary goal is to maintain the health of their skin without the use of harsh or abrasive ingredients.

reviews.review_title: Works Wonderfully And I Am Truly Impressed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wear make-up almost every day and i have sensitive skin. Most face washes dry my skin out really bad. It is also tiring having to wash my face multiple times to remove make up and cleanse the skin. This Skinfix gel cleanser works wonderfully! In one wash i can cleanse my skin and remove my make-up at the same time! I'm happy to say my skin feels soft and it does not feel dry after using this product. I've come to really like and trust the Skinfix brand. So far, I've enjoyed all of their products! I like how this face wash is scent-free. I also tried washing my face while wearing waterproof mascara and it washed about 70% of it off. A little harder to get waterproof mascara off. I definitely recommend this for sensitive or dry skin, but it would work great for all skin types!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician I love the skinfix brand for making products that help repair the skin barrier while still treating skin concerns. The new Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is a great cleanser for those looking to remove their makeup and daily dirt and grime without stripping their skin. I found that after using this my skin felt soft and clean. I appreciate it being unscented so it doesn't cause any irritation from unnecessary fragrances. It starts off as a gel but after massaging it into the face it develops into a nice foam wash. I personally love using this but I do like to double cleanse so I use this is my second cleanser. I use an oil balm first before this to really break down any makeup or SPF leftover from the day. Overall it's a great gentle cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought SkinFix's moisturizers was gonna be the only products I was gonna to love. I was wrong. This cleanser is one the best cleansers I ever used. The smell isn't strong. Infact, it has the same smell as the push moisturizers I received from SkinFix. The formula is very pleasant. I appreciate there's no harmful chemicals in it. It foams and lather so quickly and the bubbles are the best part. The feeling of the cleanser in my hands and faces brings out my inner child. It feels like I'm playing with slime or soap that's been left in water. It's cool to the touch and feels like a light massage when rubbing it on my faces.The only negative thing a see is that I do feel dry under my eyes after drying off my face. It could be my fault so I'm not gonna hold it against Skinfix. Overall I give it 4.5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am utterly thrilled with this cleansing gel! From the moment I first tried it, I was impressed by its ease of use and the incredible lather it produces. The texture is so silky and smooth, making it a joy to massage into my skin.  But beyond the sensory experience, this gel truly delivers on its promises. It effortlessly removes every trace of makeup and SPF, even stubborn waterproof formulas, without requiring any harsh scrubbing or tugging. My skin feels incredibly clean and refreshed after each use.  What I appreciate most is its gentle yet effective formula. As someone with sensitive skin, I'm always cautious about trying new products, but this cleansing gel has been a game-changer for me. It's gentle enough to use daily without causing any irritation, yet powerful enough to thoroughly cleanse my skin.  Overall, I can't recommend this product enough. It has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine.  If you're looking for a gentle yet effective cleansing gel that leaves your skin feeling refreshed and makeup-free, look no further!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for some time now and I can honestly say it has changed my skin for the best. It removes all my makeup without making it feel dehydrated and dry. I would definetly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this product. Iu2019ve struggled with combination skin, dryness from tretinoin, and acne, and itu2019s been so hard to find a cleanser that does everything I need it to. What I usually look for in a cleanser is the ability to remove all of my makeup and spf without stripping my skin or clogging my pores. Bonus points if itu2019s able to remove even waterproof mascara! This cleanser checks all the boxes!  It lathers so luxuriously, I only need about a dime sized amount to get my whole face. Itu2019s not stripping or drying at all, it leaves me skin feeling so soft and nourished. It removes waterproof mascaras SO easily. No raccoon eyes, no having to rub my eyes forever or even use an oil-based remover beforehand. This stuff is amazing!  My only complaint is the packaging. It dispenses from the bottom of the cap, it doesnu2019t come off fully, instead you just twist it to open and twist back to close. The issue I have with that is that after I dispense the desired amount of product, there is always more that leaks out when I twist the cap closed. Itu2019s not a huge issue, but it would be nice to not have any leakage at all.  Overall an amazing product, Skinfix never fails to impress!   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this gentle gel cleanser during my morning and night time routines for the past week and a half and so far I have been loving it. I used to have to double cleanse a lot with an oil based and then a gel based cleanser to be able to really remove all my sunscreen and makeup but I no longer have to since I have switched to using this. I noticed when I used a makeup wipe after washing my face that there would be almost nothing left to come off which meant my face was nice and clean just with this cleanser. I also have always had dry skin and I like that this does not leave my face feeling as stretched, tight, and dry when I use it. I love that it is a gel form instead of foam so it is good for sensitive skin and that it does not have any fragrance. I would recommend this cleanser to anyone with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is another great product from this trusted brand. One of the many reasons I love Skinfix products is because some, including this one, have the anti-contamination cap; as a germ-conscious person, this is very important to me. This gel-to-foam cleanser thoroughly cleanses the skin without stripping or over drying the skin barrier. I have sensitive, dry skin and have been able to use this cleanser daily for over a week. My skin looks and feels great with this cleanser. I like that it explicitly states it removes makeup and SPF. There are those rare nights where I am too tired to do a full nighttime double cleanse routine, and have chosen this cleanser because I trust this Skinfix product will do a great job at cleaning my face of SPF.  The only con with this cleanser is the cap. As previously stated, I am a fan of the hygienic dispenser but the cap leaks on my specific bottle. When I place the cleanser on the shelf, cap side down, as it is designed, a large amount of product leaks out. I double checked that it was securely closed, but no matter what I do, it still leaks.

reviews.review_title: Leaves your face clean and refreshed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a beauty enthusiast who loves everything makeup and skincare related. I have combination/slightly sensitive skin. So far this cleanser has been a great addition to my routine. The packaging has a half twist cap that you can easily squeeze product out of without needing to take the cap fully off. A little does go a long way so be careful when getting product out. The consistency is a clear gel that turns into a nice lather once massaged into your skin. Itu2019s not a heavy cleanser and has been great on my sensitive skin without any reaction. I have been loving this in my nighttime routine because it leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed after taking off my makeup for the day. This honestly can be used day and night because of how nourishing and lightweight it is.  Overall, this is a great cleanser for dehydrated/dull skin, or even combo/sensitive skin. It also removes makeup and spf, making it a great cleanser to add it any skincare routine, day or night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely thrilled with the incredible results I've experienced using the new cleanser from Skinfix. Dealing with dry to normal skin that's exceptionally sensitive has been a challenge, especially with most facial cleansers leaving my skin feeling tight and accentuating dry patches. However, stumbling upon this remarkable gem has been a game-changer. Its unique formulation transforms from a gentle gel to a luxurious foam, effortlessly removing all traces of grime and makeup without compromising the delicate balance of my skin. What sets it apart is not only its remarkable efficacy but also its commitment to being fragrance-free and crafted from clean ingredients, ensuring both human and environmental safety. Moreover, I can't help but rave about how beautifully it lathers and rinses off, leaving my skin irresistibly smooth and deeply hydrated. Overall, if you're in search of a gentle yet effective cleanser that not only protects your skin barrier but also contains top-tier ingredients, this is the product for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix barrier+, ceramide + ectoin gentle gel cleanser is incredible! It is a gel to foam cleanser that starts silky and lathers up VERY well. I will say it's a twist to open cap (it sits on its cap) and before I continue about the cleanser itself, I do want to warn you. It is very thin at first, so I recommend that you turn it upside down, twist it open, slowly turn it and dispense your desired amount of cleanser (I also recommend start with a little less than you think you need) then tip it back and twist it shut before cleaning your face. It will come out fast and when I laid it on its side a bunch did escape onto my counter. Take it from me, I accidentally wasted some on accident and bummed myself out! Before using Skinfix barrier+ my skin was tired, definitely on the dry side and all around just looked dull. Since using Skinfix barrier+ my face is softer, smoother, a little more plump and hydrated looking, and the best part is, the results last longer than previous cleansers I have tried! My  daughter  who has sensitive skin has also been using Skinfix. She has psoriasis and it's helped add hydration to her dry skin without causing her any itching or discomfort, which is amazing because usually she avoids washing her face. I am allergic to the sun and have to go outside for work so I'm constantly slathering thick sunscreen on my face to avoid hives, and I've been able to wash my face with Skinfix and not have to either scrub to get it off or wash my face more than once to get all the residue off. It comes off with regular washing and the first time which is AMAZING. It's definitely a lightweight smooth cleanser that foams up very nicely, and it has nothing added to it! No fragrance, phthalates, oils and it's even Gluten free so if your someone who suffers from a Gluten allergy or doesn't like Gluten this cleanser is safe for you! If your looking for your next cleanser without additives!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix has created another game-changer! Its gel consistency is very lathering, delivering a refreshing cleansing experience. What's more, it's perfect for sensitive skin like mine, as it effectively cleanses without causing irritation. Post-wash, my skin feels incredibly smooth, thanks to its non-drying formula. (Most cleansers dry me out immediately! ) I originally tried their gel and cream moisturizer (which are both amazing and have become a very important part of my daily routine) so having the cleaner to match not only the quality but to have one brand for my entire skin care definitely helps my routine. I am noticing a difference already. I highly recommend this cleanser for its gentle yet effective cleansing power. A definite must-have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product helped to improve my skin tremendously! It helped to clear break outs without stripping moisture

reviews.review_title: Gentle, but Not Eye Area Friendly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Over the past few months Iu2019ve noticed a change in my skin where cleansers that used to work just fine for me leave me feeling dry and tight.  Now instead of anything purifying, I look for soothing cleaners or ones with great ingredients like ceramides! I was super excited to have to chance to try the new SkinFix Ceramide Gentle Gel Cleanser because it seemed like everything I needed! First off, I love the packaging. Itu2019s super easy to use and I just feel like itu2019s more convenient than pump cleansers as gravity is working with you rather than against you.  This is a very thin liquidy formula that slightly foams after rubbing into the skin. I found that this worked super well as a second cleanse, however this stung my eyes and if I had any active pimples, it stung some of those too. Itu2019s mostly for this reason that Iu2019m not crazy impressed as I want to be able to use this everywhere I used an oil cleanser to ensure the oil gets washed away. After washing, my face feels nice, not tight and dry, but I wouldnu2019t say that I found a huge difference between this and other more hydrating cleansers.  I think this would be a good option for those with dryer skin, but if you have sensitive eyes, I donu2019t think this is the one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past few weeks, Iu2019m in love ! It works so amazing for removing makeup as well as SPF, all while being so gentle and not stripping my skin. I love that skin feels clean and refreshed but not like the overly done clean feeling that leaves you feeling dry. A+ cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin felt clean but not stripped after using this face wash. I liked how the soap lather felt soft and moisturizing. My sensitive skin didn't experience any irritationu2014I think my skin barrier is looking better after using this twice every day. My acne has been clearing up nicely since I added this face wash into my skincare routine a week ago. I've also used this in a double cleansing routine and found that it cleanses oil, makeup, and SPF with no issues. A little goes a long way so I think this product has great value too! I'd purchase this face wash again since it's gentle, effective, and a great clean beauty find. I'd reccomend this face wash if you're looking for a gentle fragrance free formula that's suitable for sensitive, oily, or dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this gentle cleanser and found that it left my skin clean and hydrated! It works well by itself but also in a double cleansing routine. The gentle lather feels soft and great on the skin too! My skin has been looking better and I've been using this face wash for almost two weeks now.

reviews.review_title: A good addition to your skin care routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this gel cleanser, itu2019s become an essential in my morning skin routine. It's a great daily face wash that leaves my skin feeling fresh and radiant. I tend to have a lot of dead skin buildup around my nose and just after a few days of using this cleanser I have noticed a lot of change on my nose, I donu2019t have bumps on my nose as much anymore. This cleanser has a soothing and hydration effect, from my results I believe this product works effectively with other skin care products like vitamin C serums and sunscreens. The ecotin in this cleanser is built with powerful anti-inflammatory and skin-soothing properties that helps with redness, irritation, and dryness. This product is a must try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is a sensitive skin life saver! I have extremely sensitive combo (oily and dry) skin that is very particular with the products I use. This cleanser was so gentle on my skin and left it feeling so soft and moisturized without being stripped! The gel to foam texture is so soothing and smooth and it suds up very nicely. I have used this cleanser both as a makeup remover (1st cleanse in a double cleanse) and as a regular cleanser (after removing makeup/on clean skin) and it is so effective both ways! Ceramides are the only thing that I have found that actually repair and soothe my skin barrier, so to be able to have them in a face wash in addition to a ceramide cream that I typically use has really helped improve the texture and feel of my skin. The packaging of this cleanser is also super convenient and easy to use, it a twist open lid that allows you to dispense the perfect amount of product. No leaks either! I would recommend this cleanser to anyone with sensitive and combo/dry skin who is looking for a deep moisturizing cleanser that will leave your skin glowing and smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin that tends to be red after washing my face. I tried the Skinfix barrier Creamide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser. First I washed my face with just water, then I put on SPF for the day. A few hours later, I washed my face using the cleanser. In the before photo I can see redness and my pores are larger. In the after photo, I can tell there's less redness and my pores are not as large. Plus my skin was not as oily as before. I like the results and I will try it after wearing makeup. I like that is foams and to be honest a little goes a long way. I am not sure I like the the bottle design yet. I've never used a cleanser with this type of lid. The bottle sits with the flat side down. To open it, just twist and squeeze out the cleanser. I will have to see out is fairs sitting on my shower shelf since it will be sitting where the product comes out. **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for the past five days and itu2019s truly lovely. Iu2019m always hyper-vigilant of cleansing gels and foams because historically theyu2019ve been too much for my dry skin. However, this went above and beyond what I was expecting! The cleanser has a watery consistency when it comes out of the tube. When you add water it turns into a very light foam. I massaged it into my skin and at no point did it start to give my face that squeaky clean feeling. You know the one, where your face feels stripped of absolutely all itu2019s oils? Well, that doesnu2019t happen here! Your face is clean but it leaves the moisture barrier in tact. I love the inclusion of ceramides and ectoin which goes further to help support a healthy moisture barrier. Another attention to detail that I love is the packaging itself. It feels substantial with a twisting mechanism that releases product. All in all, I think I found a new favorite cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ufffc I really appreciate the size the size and aesthetic of the bottle, itu2019s so cute and contains a lot of product. Letu2019s not sleep on the twist to lock cap because you donu2019t lose as much product as you typically would with a pump bottle. A dollop of this product is enough to cover the whole face. I didnu2019t notice any sent to the product and it is very gentle on my skin. I can definitely tell that itu2019s restoring my skin barrier because it significantly reduced the amount of skin texture and closed codons on my forehead and tone. Itu2019s so gentle, that I would honestly recommend for anyone of any age. But for us, ladies that are worried about skin elasticity, I have noticed a little more plumpness in my cheeks, which was very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination but not sensitive skin. I tried the Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser at nights for a week to cleanse off my SPF and any excess oil or sweat accumulated throughout the day. The cleanser starts off clear with a gel like consistency, and has no scent. Upon lathering on my damp face, it foams up a tiny bit. While on my face, I could feel that it was not stripping my skin. After I washed it off, I patted my face dry. I was extremely impressed by how soft my skin felt after usage. The cleanser definitely does not damage my skin barrier, and I felt it actually helped to restore it. My skin was also irritated and drier than usual on some days, and it helped to calm my skin. This cleanser stands out against others I have tried (including ones that are advertised as gentle). I would recommend this cleanser to anyone looking for a no frills product that effectively cleans the skin while not being damaging.

reviews.review_title: Decent, but Not My Fave for Dry Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried many foaming facial cleansers, beginning when I developed an obsession for skincare 6 years ago. The SkinFix Gentle Gel Cleanser is one of the better ones that I've tried. It cleanses well, and leaves nothing behind - not even a residue-like feel after washing the foam off. The nearly doesn't have a smell, but when applied, I feel as if it has a slight plastic scent. Nothing too awful, as the scent is extremely light. It foams greater than many others I've tried, and doesn't require a lot of elbow grease to create the foam. Now, to preface, I have extremely dry skin. I've found that foaming cleansers tend to dry me out, and this one is no different. It's doesn't cause a terrible amount of dryness, I've found that it sticks to my dry patches and irritates them, even after 20 or so minutes of washing it off. I've let my husband use it, who has oily skin, and he's been enjoying it! He has no complaints of dry patches, and so I truly think this cleanser is best-fit for oily or combo skin. Other than the dryness, it did not cause any breakouts or purging for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a person with combination skin type, it is very difficult to find products that will suit my skin type without breaking out. I have using this Skinfix ceramide + ectoin gentle gel cleanser for some time now and it has surprised me. The thoroughly cleanses the skin without excessively drying it or breaking me out. It is a gel based cleanser which lathers well into foam when activated with water. I use it twice in a day in the morning and at night. It leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean. The ceramide helps protect my skinu2019s moisture barrier and ectoin helps in soothing damaged and irritated skin. This is a perfect cleanser with real benefits. Really happy with Skinfix for bringing this into my life. I recommend it to those with combination skin type as they will love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying the brand Skinfix, and I truly love this cleanser. My skin gets dried out from swimming because that's preferred method of exercising. Since this cleanser has ceramides in it, know that it's going to rebuild my compromise skin barrier. What I really love about this cleanser is that it's a gel foaming cleanser with no added fragrance, and it foams up very well. While foaming cleansers can often be very drying for skin, especially dry to normal type like mine, this cleanser doesn't leave behind a harsh squeaky clean feeling. I use this cleanser not only on my face but also on my body where I have acne pop up. Since using this Skinfix Barrier + cleanser, my skin is less red, acne has decreased and my skin feels more hydrated. I would definitely repurchase this cleanser.

reviews.review_title: I love everything about this cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a 35 year old Mom & wife, most women I know are set in their ways with their skincare products. They have their routines and are loyal to their products and brands. I feel like I am on the outside because I am constantly searching for new and different products. My skin can be temperamental- one day a cleanser or lotion works great and the next, it burns and leaves my skin red and irritated.  I recently tried the Skinfix Ectoin + Ceramide Gentle Gel Cleanser and really love it! I love the signature blue bottle & the packaging is awesome! It comes in a tube like bottle that twists open and closed- no extra cap on top. A little squeeze is all you need and extra product doesnu2019t leak out! Using it on my skin, my face felt nice and refreshed, no irritation whatsoever! It left my skin feeling clean and glowing!   The one small negative I have for this product is that the ingredient list isnu2019t on the bottle. I have a tendency to throw the outer packaging away without really paying attention to it, so I wouldu2019ve liked the ingredient list on the bottle itself.  Overall, I would definitely recommend Skinfix Ectoin + Ceramide Gentle Gel Cleanser to anyone looking for a gentle, refreshing cleanser

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and it tends to get oily by end of day. This gel cleanser helps remove makeup, sunscreen and dirt effectively without drying out my skin. I use it twice a day without any adverse effect because the cleanser is very gentle. The packaging can be improved into a pump for efficacy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This transparent gel, absent of any discernible scent, offers a refreshing and effective cleansing experience. Upon application to damp hands and face, it effortlessly transforms into a luxurious foam, gently enveloping the skin , leaving the complexion impeccably clean and refreshed.  What truly sets this gel cleanse apart is its ability to cleanse without causing any discomfort. Rather than leaving the skin feeling tight or stripped, it imparts a sense of softness, hydration, and suppleness. This is particularly noteworthy for individuals with dry skin like me.  The inclusion of key ingredients such as ceramide and ectoin further enhances its efficacy. Ceramide, known for its ability to strengthen the skin barrier, works to fortify and protect the skin against external aggressors. Meanwhile, ectoin, a powerful hydrating agent, helps to lock in moisture, ensuring that the skin remains plump and hydrated even after cleansing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is a true skincare gem that effortlessly removes makeup, SPF, and excess oils without compromising the skin barrier. As someone who adores a reliable daily foaming cleanser, this product has become an absolute favorite in my skincare routine. Its gentle yet effective formula ensures a thorough cleanse without any harsh stripping effects, leaving my skin feeling refreshed and balanced after each use. What's more, I've found that it pairs seamlessly with other skincare products, enhancing the effectiveness and contributing to an overall healthier complexion. Skinfix has truly hit the mark with this cleanser, as they always do, providing a skincare solution that's both practical and beneficial for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved Skinfix Cleanser. This product is definitely worth trying. One of the first things I noticed about this product was that it doesnu2019t have a sticky thick feeling like other cleansers I have tried, and it also doesnu2019t have a weird smell. I have a lot of dryness and combination skin and this product definitely helped target my issues and it also feels hydrating. I absolutely loved using this product. I love how easily it removed waterproof/ hard to get off makeup without any problems. This is probably one of my new favorite cleansers! I highly recommend this product to anyone that is looking for a good cleanser that helps protect your skin and itu2019s barriers and anyone thatu2019s looking for the perfect cleanser to help remove makeup thatu2019s hard to get off!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily, acne-prone, and sensitive skin, so finding a good cleanser is a bit difficult. I've tried other products from this line, and they worked very well for my skin. So I had to try this cleanser. Honestly, Iu2019m very impressed. Usually, when I try a cleanser for my type of skin that claims itu2019s gentle,u201d I feel like it doesnu2019t properly cleanse my skin. But this one does without feeling tight or super dry. I tried it in the morning; itu2019s very refreshing! Then I tried it in the evening with oil cleansing at first, and after just cleansing with this one, my face felt very clean! After two weeks of using this cleanser, I can see my pores getting a bit smaller. My face looks amazing after using this cleanser along with other products from this line!I am definitely buying this again and adding it to my normal skincare routine! I will be recommending this to my family and friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician I love trying different skin care brands and testing out how they work for my skin. In the first day that I tested out this face wash I saw a difference in the texture of my skin. This cleanser left my face feeling moisturized, smooth and glowy. I have dry and sensitive skin so itu2019s hard finding products that work for me even if they do specify that theyu2019re for my skin type. Usually other face washes Iu2019ve used in the past have left my skin feeling tight and dull but this product worked great. I would definitely recommend this cleanser to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who values simplicity and effectiveness in skincare, I've found Skinfix's Ceramide+ Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser to be a game-changer. The gel-to-foam formula feels luxurious on the skin, effortlessly removing makeup, SPF, and excess oils without stripping my skin. My skin feels replenished, balanced, and noticeably softer. I love how this cleanser supports my skin barrier. It's gentle yet effective, and I've noticed a significant improvement in the appearance of my pores. I especially love that I don't need to double cleanse, Using it morning and night has become a ritual that I look forward to, knowing it will leave my skin feeling clean and hydrated. Overall, Skinfix's cleanser has become a staple in my skincare routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past few weeks, I can tell that the quality of my skin has improved. My only qualm is with the dispenser, as I donu2019t feel that itu2019s the most convenient way to use the products and feels a bit messy. Otherwise, I love the contents & definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a good hydrating water-based cleanser!

reviews.review_title: Love it for my skin barrier
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this new cleanser from skinfix, I have combination and sensitive skin so I have to be picky with my face wash that does not strip my skin. This cleanser feels really nice on my skin while restoring my skin barrier, I used it for a week and it easily removes all my makeup and cleans well without breaking me out. It is nice to use as gel and made into foam cleanser, and you only need a tiny amount to cover your whole face, It is a bit runny but not too much it is manageable personally I do not have a problem with it. I also love the packaging, it comes in blue and is so pretty and refreshing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying skinfixu2019s new ceramide ectoin gentle gel cleanser and As someone with sensitive skin prone to occasional dryness, finding the right skincare products is crucial. The gentle gel cleanser I've been using has truly been a revelation for me. Its formula not only cleanses but also strengthens my skin's barrier, leaving it feeling refreshed and fortified after each time I use. The gel to foam texture gives a luxurious cleansing experience without stripping away moisture. Even after a few I've noticed a remarkable improvement in my skin's overall texture and resilience. It feels noticeably softer, smoother, and more balanced.The experience of using this cleanser is equally impressive. The scent is subtle and refreshing, with natural undertones. This cleanser is great to anyone with sensitive or easily irritated skin. Its gentle yet effective formula makes it suitable for daily use, providing both cleansing and barrier restoring benefits. Whether you're dealing with occasional dryness like me or struggling with more persistent skin issues, this cleanser is sure to become your best friend. **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Having combination skin, itu2019s extremely hard to find a cleanser that strikes that perfect balance between cleansing, without being stripping, so that my skin doesnu2019t get agitated. This gentle yet effective face cleanser from Skinfix does the trick! It comes out runny but quickly lathers into a nice gentle foam that thoroughly cleans away all traces of dirt, oil and leftover makeup while still preserving and fortifying my skin barrier.  After using this every morning and night, my skin looks and feels so much healthier and balanced. My skin barrier also feels more intact which has led to increased hydration as well.  I always appreciate that Skinfix is a clean brand with unscented products and that they are tested by unbiased dermatologists.  If you are tired of harsh cleansers that damage your skin barrier and strip your skin of moisture, I highly recommend giving this product a try to see and feel the difference for yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been suffering of extremely dry skin lately and have been using this cleanser for about 2 weeks. The packaging of the cleanser is very easy to store and use. I love the tube style of it. Itu2019s great for traveling and mess free use and storage. I absolutely love the texture of the cleansers. It lathers nicely. The gel textures creates a nice foam. It removes my makeup and leaves my skin feeling clean! It doesnu2019t feel dry or stripped after cleansing. My skin has been feeling and looking healthy after I started using this. My skin doesnu2019t feel dry. This is a great cleanser for dry skin girlies. I feel like itu2019s truly helped my skin maintain a healthy barrier. Removes all my makeup and sunscreen without leaving my skin dry. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the skin-fix barrier creams for a couple of months so I was excited to try this cleanser! I used it as soon as it came in the mail and I love it already. It really cleanses the skin and leaves it feeling fresh. I used it to remove my makeup and it worked wonders. I like the fact that it also protects the skin barrier. Itu2019s powerful enough to leave my skin fresh and gentle enough to keep my skin protected. I also love that itu2019s foamy. I usually prefer foamy cleansers that lather really well. I would recommend this to anyone who loves skin-fix products especially the moisturizers. I love that this can be used day or night. Iu2019m looking forward to seeing what this does for my skin in the coming months but so far I am really loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A must try product. I love how gentle it was on my skin.

reviews.review_title: A New Favorite in My Routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser! I am a student who cares about skincare and have had issues with it in the past, so a quick and easy but good cleanser is a must for me. This cleanser melts into my skin, making it so easy to use and wash off. It has made a huge difference to my skinu2019s health and barrier. This is especially true when I have paired it with the barrier restoring gel cream. I love the fact that it allows you to get the product out without having to touch the rest of the cleanser and possibly contaminate it. I have sensitive skin and this makes me feel secure in the safety of this cleanser. It makes you feel hydrated without a greasy texture on top. It is also a lot lighter than other ones so you donu2019t have to use as much product. I would definitely recommend this for anyone who has had issues with their skin. This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a skincare enthusiast, I eagerly tried the (Enthusiast) Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser for seven days, and it's been a revelation. Its innovative gel-to-foam formula effortlessly removes makeup, SPF, and excess oils without compromising the skin barrier. The patented B-L3 Complex truly sets it apart, delivering nourishment and protection with each use.  Throughout the week, my skin felt remarkably refreshed and balanced. Unlike harsh cleansers, this one left my skin feeling clean without any tightness or dryness. The gentle formulation made it suitable for daily use, even for my sensitive skin.  I particularly appreciated its effectiveness in removing stubborn makeup and sunscreen, making my nighttime routine a breeze. Plus, the lightweight texture made it a pleasure to use, transforming my cleansing ritual into a spa-like experience.  After incorporating this cleanser into my routine for a week, I noticed a visible improvement in my skin's texture and overall appearance. It looked smoother, healthier, and more radiantu2014a testament to the product's efficacy.  In terms of star rating, I wholeheartedly give the (Enthusiast) Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser a perfect 5 out of 5 stars. It exceeded my expectations, providing gentle yet powerful cleansing without compromising on efficacy. Whether you're a skincare enthusiast like me or simply someone looking for a reliable cleanser, this product is definitely worth trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely ended up loving the Skinfix Ectoin + Ceramide Gentle Gel Cleanser.  This is such a great product, and I honestly can't wait to look into some more products from Skinfix after trying this cleanser.  My face always felt super clean, especially when doing a double cleanse.  I think it actually really helped my breakouts as well.  I definitely noticed an improvement. Also, I am a daily makeup wearer.  It did easily remove my sunscreen, concealer, tinted moisturizer, blush, lip gloss, and eyebrow gel, which is so great.  However, I found it to not really help with removing my mascara fully.  I loved the texture of the gel cleanser because it felt luxurious and glides on the skin so smoothly.  It made my skin look refreshed, clear, more radiant and feel so soft.  Overall, this is an exceptional, gentle skincare product that I would recommend for many different skin types and textures.  This product is definitely being added to my skincare routine because my face has never looked so good.

reviews.review_title: A new must have for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I live on a  small farm and spend alot of time outdoors. In wind and dusty conditions . Ive been so excited to try this skinfix cleansing gel, and I have to say I really like it. It is the perfect cleanser for my oily skin. I works great without stripping the skin. Even after just  1 week of using this product I can see a  difference in my skins clarity and brightness. It's a gentle cleanser anf feels great afterwards.I really like the fact that it's made from natural ingredients. It's cruelty free and vegan. This is a great product for anyone that has acne and/ or oily skin. It's definitely the best cleanser that I've used and I've used quite a few.  The tube has a unique cap that dispenses just the right amount , thats an awesome feature. Do yourself a favor and give this awesome product a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had the pleasure of testing this cleanser out for a few weeks now and it's my favorite new cleanser! I'm an early twenties new grad, who is working my first post-grad office job in the technology industry. I love to pamper myself with the latest and best self-care items! A little background about my skin: I have acne-prone, sensitive skin and I deal with dark spots and uneven texture. I wear a full face of makeup everyday for meetings with clients, so it's very important for me to find a cleanser that will effectively take off my makeup and spf, while not stripping my natural oils and is safe for my sensitive skin. I think I've found just that with this cleanser! The product is very easy to dispense and use; just twist cap and squeeze the tube and voila! You have your product dispensed. It has no scent and washes off makeup extremely well. I find that I don't have to double cleanse. It doesn't feel stripping after and it maintains your skin's moisture. I highly recommend this cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 32 year old beauty enthusiast living in Arizona. I suffer from dry skin year-round. My dry skin often leads to redness, irritation and flaking. I like that the cleanser is made for dry, dehydrated and dull skin and is able to remove my SPF and makeup. I found that if I am not wearing eye makeup I can get away without needing to double cleanse and my face is completely clean.   The 5oz tube will last a long time! As a gel to foaming cleanser a little goes a long way. I do wish that the packaging was a bit different as I have found the cleanser comes out very quickly when I twist the bottom of the tube and I often get too much product out.   The ingredients in the cleanser really help assist my dry skin. My skin doesnu2019t hurt, sting or feel tight. The patented B-L3 complex and the ceramides help replenish my skinu2019s natural lipids and assists with repairing my skin barrier. Ectoin is a new ingredient to me that is also perfect for my skin type because it helps soothe and intensely hydrate my very dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Non drying Gel Cleanser that feels clean
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clue: An unscented gel cleanser that lathers quickly, cleanses well, and does not leave skin feeling dry.  What is SkinFixu2019s Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser  My favorite types of cleansers for my combination skin are gel cleansers, and this may be my favorite face wash I have used to date. I love how quickly it works into a foamy lather and how it actually cleanses the skin. When rinsing the product off, my skin feels squeaky clean without feeling tight and dry. On days where I am tired and have little energy, I can use this cleanser alone and it removes makeup and sunscreen; however, I would still recommend double cleansing for heavier makeup and waterproof sunscreen days.   The cleanser is housed in an innovative squeeze tube packaging with a twist to unlock opening on the bottom. There is no flip cap to fight open every time you use this cleanser which adds to the convenience factor, but there is a slight learning curve as to how much to turn and squeeze when dispensing the product so it doesnu2019t spill onto the cap too. The cleanser doesnu2019t have a scent and is a clear gel.   My skin feels clean and refreshed after using. Since the cleanser is gentle and nondrying, I can see it working for almost everyone. Also, as someone with acne prone combination skin who also experiences active breakouts, I highly recommend you give SkinFixu2019s Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser a try.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used any number of different types of cleansers over the past few years . Again, I am surprised by the ingenuity of the skinfix brand in the making of this tube. I love that it doesn't have a traditional cap and that all I have to do is turn the top and squeeze the tube, no more flip caps or other caps to lose. The product itself has a really great consistency in its gel form, its decently thick and doesn't run and it foams up very well which makes me feel that it's really working, unfortunately in my experience foaming cleansers are drying . . I have combination skin and have hormonal breakouts on the sides of my face . This does a great job of drying those out but in general leaves my skin very dry  I love the concept of anti cruelty and that this product is vegan along with being made I. The USA **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive and reactive skin so finding products for my skin sometimes can be a challenging. I have noticed that certain products made for sensitive skin tend to leave my skin dry and looking dull. I saw that Skinfix Barrier Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is good for sensitive skin and helps hydrate the skin. I decided to give it a try in hopes of finding my new cleanser. reviews.review_title: The answer to my easily irritated skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I already use other Skinfix products and happily tried their Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser. I do wish that the cleanser was a little more hydrating, with a thicker, creamier foam formula. Once I use it and dry off my face, it feels like I need to moisturize immediately. On one hand, it allows for easy dispensing, but on the other hand, if I squeeze too hard, I tend to use more product than necessary, which has happened a few times. After using this cleanser, I did notice that my skin felt a bit dry, especially when I over-cleansed. However, despite the dryness, my skin feels incredibly clean and refreshed.
