reviews.review_text: As a 20 year old college student who is out and about in sun all day, this cleanser is my holy grail and I am absolutely obsessed with it. This cleanser has become a part of my daily routine. It removes all the layers of makeup, spf and the dust from my face in one wash. It feels smooth and gentle on the skin and smells great. It has a light, not a very strong smell which I like A LOT. The packaging is also great. But the thing I love the most is how gentle it is on my skin. My skin tends to get very dry after using a cleanser, but Skinfix's Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser did not disappoint. It maintained the hydration of my face and left a smooth, soft, cleansed, bouncy and health skin. I have had a lot of cleansers which either left my skin too dry or didn't cleanse properly but Skinfix's Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is a great at both cleansing and keeping your skin hydrated. I LOVE IT!   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this as I love Skinfix products but this was a let down. It is definitely gentle on my skin and didnu2019t irritate at all. I donu2019t feel like it cleaned my skin well at all. I even used an oil cleanser before and had this as my second cleanse and I still had sunscreen on my skin. It doesnu2019t lather well but thatu2019s not necessarily a bad thing. I think that might be why it doesnu2019t cleanse my skin well. I do love the packaging it comes in and the twist top. The texture is also wonderful and runny but again it did cleanse well. Maybe if your sunscreen isnu2019t as hard to wash off as mine this would be a fine cleanser. Itu2019s great for sensitive and dry skin as well. Iu2019m going to keep trying didnu2019t ways to pair it as I really want to love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a 30-year-old living in Los Angeles and as a beauty fanatic, I loved trying the Skinfix cleanser! It squeezes as a gel, but it becomes foam once you lather it into your hands. I love the way that it feels on the skin. It doesn't feel like it is stripping the natural oils, while also successfully removing makeup and SPF on my skin. Such a solid cleanser that feels gentle enough to use daily. I have dry skin, so this feels hydrating, which is typically what I look for in skincare products. Sometimes, my skin can look dull, and I love that after using this, my skin looks bright and revitalized. I also love that the ingredients are clean, this is what I now look for in products. It will become a staple in my daily skincare routine!

reviews.review_title: Great addition to the barrier+ line!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the entire skinfix barrier+ line and this product is no exception. This product is both refreshing and revitalizing; itu2019s a breath of fresh air for your skin. I wear make up almost every day and I usually wash my face and follow up with micellar water to still found remnants of foundation on my cotton round. I was pleasantly surprised to find that this face was removed every little bit of makeup from my face with just one wash. I absolutely love the innovative packaging, you twist just once on the cap to open it and squeeze just the right amount into your hands. This frothy was starts as a gel and forms a nice lather on your face as you scrub. After you rinse you will find your face feeling soft, smooth and oh so clean. Followed up with the skinfix barrier+ moisturizer this product is a game changer!   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

so i do like this cleanser. it does the job it is meant to do: cleaning skin and removing makeup without stripping the skin. I found even with an excess amount (caused by the lid) it isnu2019t stripping at all and leaves me feeling clean without dryness. The issue I have is the lid design make it so that even just a bit of pressure leads to a large amount of product coming out, and it isnu2019t very easy to put it back into the container at all so each time Iu2019ve used it, it has led to excess product coming out of the tube and thus being wasted. I think this is a pretty big problem for me and given that it is a relatively simple cleanser overall, I donu2019t see myself replacing my drug store cleanser with this after I finish using the bottle. I would say this works good for those who have a higher budget and want a non-stripping cleanser for when they plan to do face masks or chemical peels

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is an effective cleanser for those with sensitive skin like mine. Its unique blend of ceramides effectively removes impurities without stripping away moisture, leaving my skin feeling clean and nourished at the same time. I love its gentle formula that doesn't cause any irritation or redness. The cleanser targets to protect the skin barrier, just like the other products on its line which I love. After using it for a few days, I noticed an improvement in the overall texture and clarity of my skin. I used it everyday after wearing makeup and my skin felt soft and not irritated. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a soothing and effective cleanser that's gentle enough to use in the morning and also at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love many Skinfix products and I especially really love this cleanser now. I have tried many different cleansers and struggle to find one that works well for my dry, sensitive skin. Many cleansers leave my face stripped of moisture and just not great overall. Since using this cleanser, my skin has been great. Itu2019s very gentle on my sensitive skin and makes my skin feel clean without stripping it. My skin still feels hydrated after cleansing. I really love this cleanser as part of the barrier+ line as I love ceramides in my skincare and especially a cleanser. It lathers well as a thin gel consistency that foams up as you massage it into your face which I love. As with all Skinfix products I love that it is free from fragrance and other harmful ingredients. I personally really like the twist lid packaging as I find it more convenient and easier to use. This is definitely a cleanser that I would highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has a lightweight gel texture that feels soothing upon application. It's gentle yet effective, making it a pleasure to use daily. It lathers nicely without stripping the skin of its natural oils. The combination of ceramides and ectoin is what stands out in this cleanser. Ceramides help to reinforce the skin barrier and maintain hydration, while ectoin protects the skin from environmental stressors. This blend is particularly beneficial for my sensitive skin, as it helps prevent irritation. After using this cleanser for a week now, I've noticed a significant improvement in the comfort and appearance of my skin. It feels more hydrated and less reactive to the usual stressors like pollution and changing temperatures. The redness and tightness I typically experience have diminished, making my skin feel healthy and look radiant. This cleanser is a fantastic choice for anyone with sensitive or stressed skin.  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this cleanser for about a week. Itu2019s a gel texture cleanser that distributes nicely over my face, and I also use it over my eyes and lashes. It foams up very nicely, does not sting and washes off very easily with no residue or sticky feeling left behind. My skin feels nice and moisturized, it doesnu2019t feel dry or stripped. The tube has a twist lock cap which makes it very easy to use and prevent leaking. It doesnu2019t have a particular scent to me, it is non scented. You only have to use a small amount to get a good cleanse going so the product should last quite a while. The box itself looks nice and has all the information you need from the product and its ingredients. I really like the cleanser and will continue using it, especially since itu2019s gently enough to use over the eyes.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix Barrier+ Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is a skincare product designed to cleanse the skin while maintaining its natural moisture barrier. Formulated with ceramides and ectoin, this gentle gel cleanser promises to leave the skin feeling clean, soft, and hydrated.  One of the standout features of this cleanser is its gentle formula, which is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. The gel texture feels refreshing on the skin and lathers well, providing a thorough cleanse without stripping the skin of its natural oils.  I particularly appreciate the inclusion of ceramides in this cleanser, as they are known for their ability to strengthen the skin barrier. This is especially beneficial for those with dry or compromised skin, as it helps to lock in moisture and protect the skin from environmental aggressors. Another key ingredient in this cleanser is ectoin, a natural molecule that is said to have anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. This ingredient helps to soothe and calm the skin, making it ideal for those with sensitive or irritated skin.  In terms of performance, I found that the Skinfix Barrier+ Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser effectively removes dirt, oil, and makeup without leaving any residue behind. After using this cleanser, my skin feels clean, refreshed, and soft to the touch.  I also appreciate the packaging of this product, which comes in a convenient pump bottle that dispenses just the right amount of product. The bottle is also sturdy and easy to use, making it ideal for both home and travel use.  Overall, I highly recommend the Skinfix Barrier+ Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser to anyone looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser that helps to maintain the skinu2019s natural moisture barrier. Whether you have dry, sensitive, or normal skin, this cleanser is sure to leave your skin feeling clean, hydrated, and refreshed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello, Iu2019m Chelsea. I work as a health educator. I am someone who is passionate about self-care and wellness. I had a nice experience using the Skin Fix Ceramide and Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser.   I apply the cleanser to wash my face in the mornings and night. After rinsing the cleanser, it helps to pat your skin dry with a washcloth or hand towel. The cleaner does not irritate my skin, cause acne breakouts, or leave it red. It has a smooth texture. It does not have a smell and pleasantly lathers on my skin well.  The cleanser has helped my skin from being dry and looking dull. The product helps to keep my skin feeling healthy and looking nice. I am pleased with SkinFix products and enjoy using them regularly. The brand does not add unnecessary chemicals and fragrances to their product. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: The only Cleanser your skin needs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix was a new brand to me a couple months ago. However, I got to try out a couple of their moisturizers & realized what I was missing.   When I saw their new Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser, I knew I needed to try it out. I was super pleased with how well it worked, the texture, the packaging & how my skin looked & felt.   The packaging is recognizable. The Cleanser comes in a fairly large tube type container. To open it, you have to twist the cap. It clicks when you twist it open. I love this feature. It means nothing is going to waste in a cap.   The only downside I saw was that the gel did dispense quickly even without squeezing the tube. I thought the speed was fine. I was more worried that some would be wasted because I wasn't ready for it to exit the tube yet.   The texture was fantastic. It is a clear gel. It wasn't overly thick or super thin. I thought it was a pretty even consistency. It was smooth & felt almost creamy right before it foams. It has a good amount of foam. It wasn't thick like a lather & it didn't disappear super fast either. A testament to how well it's formulated.   I used it both in the morning & at night. I felt it worked equally well at both intervals.   Skinfix tied in their patented B-L3 complex as part of the ingredients. The formula consists of ceramides, fatty acids, cholesterol, B9, vitamin E, folic acid & signal peptides. It's a powerhouse formula set to restore, repair & maintain a healthy skin barrier.   This cleanser gets the job done, too. It removed all my skincare products & makeup without having to double cleanse.   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Frothy feel for a fresh face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser was just the fix my dry, sensitive skin was searching for. First of all, with all cleansers, foaming is an essential component. I love how this cleanser foams when I rub it into my face. I also love the top of the bottleu2014the applicator is perfect for keeping a sanitary skincare routine. It is simpleu2014just twist the top of the bottle and squeeze for a small amount of product to come out. The product feels so lightweight and gentle on my skin. After using it, my face feels tightened, cleansed, and smoothed out. I like to use this product at the end of the day, after removing my makeup but before moisturizing my face. I put a light layer of warm water on my face and then us a pea sized amount of the product and rub it until it lathers on my face. I then rinse it off with some more warm water and tap it dry with a clean towel. It is a guarantee that my face feels so fresh. I highly recommend~

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I decided to give the Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser by Skinfix a try. Iu2019m all about gentle cleansers that donu2019t mess with my skinu2019s natural oils. After dealing with cystic acne (thank you, Accutane and stress management!), now Iu2019m just trying to keep my skin happy, hydrated, and balanced. That's why I was so excited to try this face wash because of skin barrier healing benefits!  When I first unscrewed the cap all the product squirts out into my hand. And then... I realized how the actual cap works. You only have to turn the cap a smidge for the product to come out of the tint hole in the center that disperses the product.) It's still not necessarily my favorite way of dispensing face wash.  The cleanser itself doesnu2019t have any scent, which I appreciate, and it also doesn't leave my skin feeling dry. After using it for about a week, morning and night, my skin definitely feels softer.  So, if youu2019re thinking about trying it out, just be careful when youu2019re dispensing the product. Apart from that hiccup, the Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is pretty solid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using Skinfix ceramide cleanser last week in my morning routine. As a personal preference I prefer gel cleanser that turns into foam with water and that was the case with Skinfix cleanser, its texture aligns with my preference. Itu2019s so gentle on the skin yet cleans the skin. However with makeup it did not remove thick textures like mascara so personally I would clean my skin from makeup first with makeup remover then use the cleanser. The presence of ceramide leaves the skin not so dry after cleaning my face. Itu2019s also important for anti aging factors which makes it really appealing. Also it helps protect and renew skin barrier. The packaging was not the best in my opinion, although it is new however I find it unhygienic since i cannot place it on any counter as it will contaminate the area in which the product come out in.

reviews.review_title: Leaves you feeling clean and hydrated!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a woman in my mid thirties with truly combo skin (both dry and oily patches) it can sometimes be hard to find a product that works on all areas of my face but this cleanser has been great! The twist cap I actually came to like because it's easier to use while in the shower, no need to unscrew a cap that I'd most likely drop and it's quicker than using a flip back style cap. As far as scent goes this is truly unscented and any smell from ingredients is pretty neutral. It lathers up nicely! It feels really soft and luxurious while scrubbing on skin. It leaves skin feeling clean without feeling stripped and at the same time my skin felt quite hydrated. I would go as far as to say you could even go without moisturizer after using if your skin isn't terribly dry. I would recommend for all skin types as this worked on all areas of my combo skin. Definitely a cleanser I will keep coming back for! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second type of cleanser that I have used from this brand. I really like this skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser because it does a great job of cleaning my face and leaving it soft and not dried out. I really like the design of the tube used for this gel cleanser. I think it is unique that all you have to do is twist the cap to dispense product. To me this is super helpful and prevents me from having to worrying about dropping the cap and searching for it all the time. This gel suds up very nicely and does a great job of removing all make up and other skin products. This cleanser has no fragrance or other harmful ingredients that I do not like. I feel good about using this product. It does not dry out your skin, which a lot of cleansers do to my face.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Gentle jelly cleanser, packaging could be better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a jelly texture cleanser which is super fun to use. It is similar to the glossier and drunk elephant jelly cleansers - glossier milky jelly cleanser and drunk elephant beste no 9 jelly cleanser.  This product claims to remove makeup and I can attest to that. It removed the ere perez avocado waterproof mascara easily. However I personally still prefer double cleansing and would use this product as a second cleanser.  The cleanser works effectively while being gentle on the skin. It is pretty liquidy and foams up a lot. It doesn't sting the eyes, except when I cleansed a sunscreen with avobenzone. Not the cleansers fault though.  My biggest gripe is the packaging design is flawed. It has a twist mechanism which unlocks the product, also very similar to drunk elephant protini moisturizer. However with those products the hole is on the top of the moisturizer. For this product it is at the bottom, which means if there is any residue (there always is), it will get on the counter. I have been resting it on the side. Personally I would have preferred just a regular flip top cap.   **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast who often wears a full face of makeup, I love to find really effective, yet gentle cleansers that can cleanse my skin without stripping or drying it out. This new Ceramide + Ecotoin Gel Cleanser from Skinfix works beautifully as a stand alone cleanser removing all makeup thoroughly or as a second step in a double-cleanse. As someone with combination skin, I typically prefer foaming cleansers and this one has a lovely gel to foaming formula that lathers beautifully once you add water and massage onto the skin. It contains a subtle scent that dissipates quickly. I love that it is formulated with their patented B-L3 Complex along with ceramides and ectoin which aid in hydrating the skin and supporting the skin barrier while cleansing and leaving the skin super soft and supple. I have quickly become a huge fan of this cleanser and how it makes my skin look super clean and refreshed after washing. I also truly appreciate that it seems a bit concentrated, so a little goes a long way, however with the current packaging, it is easy to spill or overuse, so I would definitely keep that in mind as you need to be conscious of it so you don't unintentionally waste precious product. Other than the packaging, I really do like how well this cleanser works and that it does not strip the skin of its natural oils. Definitely would recommend for anyone looking for a fabulous gel cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is absolutely perfect. It removes all makeup, even waterproof eyeliner and mascara. It is not at all harsh on my skin, and leaves it feeling moisturized and hydrated without stripping it. It doesnu2019t have a real scent to it, just very neutral and balanced. I have found that my overall skin has looked a lot clearer since the start of using this product a week ago. I look forward to seeing how this cleanser can prevent acne related to sweating/the warmer weather of summer in New York City. I like the packaging as well, it has an innovative twist design to get the product out so there is no removable cap. The ceramide ingredients are quite nice, although Iu2019m not sure how beneficial they will be to my skin long term since I immediately wash off the product as it is a cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Good cleanser very gentle on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion, but my enthusiasm for this product is genuine and unwavering. As someone who's exceptionally picky about skincare, I'm thrilled to share my experience with the Barrier+ Ceramide + Ectoin Hydrating Gentle Gel Cleanser. This gem of a cleanser exceeded all my expectations and then some. With skin that's both sensitive and prone to dryness, finding the perfect cleanser is a feat in itself. However, after just one use, I was amazed at how refreshed and clean my complexion felt. Just when I thought I had found my holy grail cleanser, this product came into my life and raised the bar even higher. It's truly a game-changer, and I can't recommend it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lover of everything skincare and was very excited to try this cleanser. My skin barrier is okay and I have a hydrated skin. I am however, very acne prone and tend to break out occasionally.   In reviewing the ingredients, I love that it has multiple ingredients which aids skin barrier, provides hydration, and evens skin tone.  Some of those ingredients are jojoba oil, ectoin, squalene, polyglutamic acid, multiple peptides, ceramides, and niacinamide. Something I was surprised to see, was that it had lactic acid which is an active exfoliant, given that the cleanser is advertised as gentle. If you have sensitive skin or you are not able to tolerate actives, just be careful about reaching for it.  The cleanser comes in a sizeable container. I used this cleanser after first cleansing my face with Micellar water using a cotton pad. To dispense it, I had to twist the cap and squeeze the tube. I liked this method of dispensing the product. The cleanser is of a gel consistency. It was fragrance free and smelled very gentle. I applied it to my face using my fingers and used circular motions to get dirt off my face. The gel lathered up with water. The first thing I noticed was how hydrating and nourishing it felt. I did not feel like my skin was being stripped dry. The cleanser left my skin feeling soft. Despite it having lactic acid, I was able to use it morning and night with no issues or sensitivity. I really like this cleanser because it gave me everything I needed: hydration and exfoliation, while evening skin tone and improving skin barrier. I will get this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite is Skinfix. It actually works on me and removes the acne. My skin is brighter and more nourished.  I love it.  I keep the bottle sitting up though so it doesn't leak out.  It is safe for the environment. I have a while set and use it everyday.  I would definitely recommend for someone trying to get rid of acne. I have more of a even tone now and better skin complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, let's talk texture. The texture of the ceramide cleanser is nothing short of luxurious. Its rich, velvety consistency glides effortlessly onto the skin, giving the skin incredible moisture. Upon application, it melts into a cushiony gel , effectively dissolving makeup, dirt, and impurities without stripping the skin of its natural oils once you foam up and rinse!As someone who prefers skincare products with a little scent but not headache inducing, I appreciate the subtlety of it in this cleanser. It has a delicate, barely-there scent that is pleasant and not overwhelming, a plus for those with sensitivities to fragrance especiallyin skincare! It also provides deep moisture, leaving the skin feeling soft, and replenished after each use. Unlike traditional foaming cleansers that can leave the skin feeling tight this gel ensures that drier skin types are left feeling deeply hydrated and nourished. I was also pretty impressed by the cleansers efficacy in removing excess makeup like mascara that was left behind. I really like how it manages to preserve the skin's natural moisture barrier, to prevent dehydration and maintaining optimal levels throughout the cleansing process!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this new gel face cleanser! So far, out of all the different face cleansers I have used this one is my favorite! Since using this cleanser though, I haven't broke out none and my face overall looks so much better! I also love how this cleanser doesn't leave a soapy residue feel behind, like some of the other products I have used in the past did. It leaves my face feeling clean and refreshed. I highly recommend anyone to try this product out, especially if your looking for a clean and gentle touch! I do feel that this product will be my go to cleanser from here on out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a beauty content creator and I have been using the Skinfix barrier ceramide + ectoin gentle gel cleanser in the morning and at night. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an esthetician who loves trying new skincare products so I have the best reccomendations for my clients! I was so excited to try a skinfix ceramide gentle gel cleanser! reviews.review_title: My New GO TO Face Wash!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with moderately sensitive combination skin, Iu2019m very critical of products I use directly on my skin. I tend to be especially weary of cleansing products because of their potential to strip my skin barrier of moisture and possibly dry out my already eczema-prone face. I always have to ensure the products I use are gentle and mild without containing any irritants that could cause a flare-up. So when I saw this Skinfix Cleansing product I was more than elated to test it out and see for myself just how gentle it is. This was a delight across the board! Using this to clean off a dayu2019s worth of layered SPF-based face products and oil-based moisturizer I noticed that my skin felt clean and fresh. I didnu2019t experience any issues with dryness or post-face washing redness or irritation. The fact that this also contains ceramide as an active is even more enticing for those who have sensitive skin concerns.

For me, I have always had glowing, blemish-free skin and itu2019s frustrating trying to find a product that agrees with my skin until now, I have been using a new product from Skinfix, itu2019s their SkinFix Barrier Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser. This gentle gel cleanser is an absolute must-have for anyone that needs a gentle, nourishing, non-reactive cleanser. I knew immediately when I applied this gentle cleanser to my face that this was special just by how soothing it felt, this gel foams a little as you massage it into your face  and neck, it feels refreshing and you can feel it cleaning your skin but, not stripping. After rinsing and patting my face dry my skin felt hydrated with no redness or irritation, this gel actually calmed my skin. I then applied my normal skincare and I couldnu2019t believe how great my skin looked and felt. With continuous use of this soothing gel my skin looked and felt better!! I had never heard of one of the ingredients which is, Ectoin and looked it up and this is what I discovered; Ectoin is an anti-inflammatory that actually heals and protects your skin from antioxidants. Ectoin helps your skin barrier to retain moisture kind of like a hyaluronic acid does. I found itu2019s also compared to Niacinamide. Ectoin has a long list of amazing attributes like plumping fine lines & wrinkles, as well as smoothing rough and bumpy skin. I mention this, because this is what I have been experiencing and my skin has truly benefited from using this gel cleanser and I want everyone to know just how fabulous this product is and regardless of how I receiv

reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. As a 36 year old woman, I tend to use an array of skin care products that can damage my skin barrier if I'm not careful. Not only is it gentle, but the thoughtful ingredients actually help to repair my skin barrier, soften my skin and even remove my makeup thoroughly. I am really enjoying the unique packaging as well. The bottle twists open at the bottom, making it such a convenient cleanser to keep anywhere you prefer whether it be the shower, by the sink or in a compartment. The odorless milky-gel formula lathers so nicely and a little goes a long way. I am very particular about what I use to wash my face and this is by far my new favorite cleanser. I cannot recommend it enough!

reviews.review_text: Here is what I enjoyed about the Skin Fix barrier plus gel cleanser. My skin looks so good after I use this gel cleanser. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a Beauty Enthusiast with a passion for skincare, so I was very excited to try out this Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser by SkinFix! For reference, I have combination skin that leans dry, and some of my main skincare concerns are acne, post-acne marks, and hydration. Overall, I really liked this cleanser! I've been using it once a day, primarily during my nighttime skincare routine. It's unscented and has the consistency of a typical gel cleanser. It does turn to foam a bit when I lather it into my skin, but not as much as I anticipated based on the description. That said,  I feel like it's very effective! I typically double cleanse, first with a micellar water and then with this cleanser. It picks up everything left behind from my first rinse and leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed! I love that this cleanser is focused on skin barrier health and that it includes effective ingredients like ceramides and ecotin. The only thing I don't love about this product is the packaging- the lockable cap is fun and innovative, but I've had trouble not smearing face wash all over the cap while using it, and thus transferring some face wash to my counter when I put it back down. Still, the product itself is great, and it's been a wonderful addition to my skincare routine! I would recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and high-quality face cleanser!

reviews.review_text: I've used any number of different cleansers and different types of cleansers over the past few years and I can honestly say that this is one of my favorites. The best part though is how gentle this cleanser is. I have dry skin and I found that this cleanser doesn't dry me out, my skin doesn't feel tight when I use it. In fact, this cleanser is so hydrating! It indeed helps to protect the skin barrier and overall leaves my skin feeling smooth and refreshed. Who doesn't love a cleanser that not only does its job but contributes to the health of skin? In addition, I'd like to mention that I'm impressed that this product is both vegan and cruelty free along with being made in the USA. reviews.review_title: Rejuvenating Cleanser That Nurtures and Hydrates
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Barrier+ Gentle Gel Cleanser with Ectoin is truly a revelation in skincare. Let's delve into why this product has become an integral part of my daily routine.  First and foremost, the formula is exceptional. Ectoin, the star ingredient, is renowned for its ability to improve skin texture and soothe dry, dehydrated skin. Since incorporating this cleanser into my regimen, I've noticed a remarkable difference in the overall health and appearance of my skin. It feels more nourished, hydrated, and resilient, with a noticeable improvement in texture.  What truly sets this cleanser apart is its gentle yet effective cleansing action. As a 47-year-old female, I prioritize products that cleanse without stripping away essential moisture. The Skinfix Barrier+ Gentle Gel Cleanser strikes the perfect balance. It thoroughly removes impurities, makeup, and excess oil, leaving my skin feeling clean, refreshed, and supple, without any tightness or dryness.  Additionally, the inclusion of skin-identical lipids further enhances the moisturizing properties of this cleanser. Not only does it cleanse my skin, but it also helps to reinforce the skin's natural barrier, promoting long-term hydration and resilience.  Versatility is another key aspect of this product that I truly appreciate. Whether it's part of my pre-workout routine at 4 AM, my morning skincare regimen, or my evening makeup removal routine, this cleanser delivers consistent results without causing any irritation or discomfort.  I must also mention the packaging, which features an easy twist-open lid for convenient use. However, it's important to ensure that the lid is securely closed to prevent any leaks.  In terms of results, I couldn't be more pleased. My skin looks and feels healthier, with a noticeable improvement in hydration, radiance, and overal texture. Fine lines and wrinkles appear softened. *This review was created through an educational promotional event hosted between the brand and beauty experts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would have given this review 5 stars, but the packaging for this products is terrible. When I first got this product, I had no idea that the opening is on the cap that you need to screw lightly (not all the way) to get the product out. Afterwards, some of the product leaked out of the cap. There is not much control on how much product to take out. Despite this, the product is phenomenal at cleaning. It even took reduce the look of my pores on my nose. In the photo, you can see that the product turns to foam. For my experience, it was better to use the product after the show to make sure I activated the product. The product then did an amazing job at reducing and cleaning pores on the face after washing off. I believe this is an amazing product. I only wish it had better packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried some Skinfix products in the past and I absolutely loved them, so when I learned about their new Gentle Gel Cleanser, I could not wait to try it. I absolutely love that all Skinfix products are vegan, cruelty-free, and plastic-neutral! I was also really impressed with the ingredients in this product like the B-L3 complex, ectoin, and ceramides, which all help to improve the health of the skin barrier. I feel like so many products on the market focus on the effectiveness of the products without focusing on the health of the skin itself, and I love that Skinfix does both effectively. First off, I love that like the other Skinfix products that I have tried, this cleanser is unscented so anyone can use it without needing to worry about sensitivities caused by added scents. I also really liked the consistency of this product. I thought that the gel lathered really nicely and that a little bit of product went a long way. I also found that this cleanser did a great job at removing any SPF or makeup, leaving my skin feeling very clean. After using the cleanser, I thought that my skin felt very hydrated, smooth, and soft, which I loved! I struggle with dry skin on a few areas on my face and I found that even without moisturizer my skin didnu2019t seem as dry as it usually is. The only thing that isnu2019t my favorite about this product is the design of the lid. While it does make dispensing the product easy, it can be a little tricky to close with one hand and once it is twisted closed a little extra product comes out, so you need to wipe it up. This is a really minor issue though and I absolutely plan on repurchasing this product in the future, as well as other Skinfix products! I definitely recommend this cleanser to anyone, but if you have sensitive or dry skin, this is a great product to try!

reviews.review_text: As a Beauty Enthusiast and a skincare fanatic I truly love and enjoy taking care of my skin. And therefore I use only high quality products on my skin for amazing results.   Recently I have been using the Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser by Skinfix. This cleanser comes in a 150 ml / 5 fl oz container. And I am amazed by how well it works. In just a short week of using this cleanser, it has already become one of my most favorite cleanser.   This cleanser is clear, pale white in color. It is fragrance free as well as vegan and cruelty free which I love. Its consistency is perfect - not runny nor too thick. I consider this to be a very mild, gentle yet effective cleanser.   I use this gel cleanser in the morning. It is very easy to use. Firstly, I wet my face. Then I take out a dime size of the cleanser on my hand. And then I use the product on my face. This cleanser lathers really well. I gently massage this cleanser on my face for about a minute and then rinse my face with warm water.   My skin feels extremely fresh and clean after using this cleanser. And not just clean but my skin feels soft, smooth and shiny. This cleanser has become a staple in my skincare routine as it's gentle enough for every day use.   I will definitely rebuy this cleanser and can't recommend it enough to anyone looking to get clear, smooth and hydrated skin. I absolutely love this cleanser as it has truly exceeded my expectations.  *This review was collected as part of a promotion. *

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been a part of the beauty community for almost eight years, and one of the best feelings is finding new amazing products. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Barrier+ Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is powered by a patented barrier lipid complex, B-L3. This cleanser is a gel-to-foam wash designed to be gentle on the skin while providing barrier restorative properties. This cleanser is formulated with ingredients such as ceramide and ectoin, which are known for their skin-soothing and protective benefits. The patented barrier lipid complex in this cleanser helps to strengthen the skin's natural barrier, which is essential for maintaining healthy and hydrated skin. When I use this cleanser, I have experienced improved skin texture, reduced redness, and overall skin health. The gel-to-foam formula of this cleanser allows for a luxurious and refreshing cleansing experience. It effectively removes impurities, dirt, and makeup without stripping my skin of its natural oils. This gentle cleanser is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Overall, the Skinfix Barrier+ Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is a promising product that combines advanced skincare technology with natural ingredients to provide a barrier-restorative and gentle cleansing experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 25 year old woman with sensitive skin, redness, and a sometimes damaged skin barrier from using too many actives -- I absolutely need products and ingredients that can balance my barrier and revitalize my skin. The newest cleanser from Skinfix has one of the most unique bottles I've ever seen in the beauty industry: a true no-spill twist cap. A very welcome surprise! As for the formulation itself, the texture of the cleanser is bouncy and hydrating against the skin. It has just enough cleansing power to take off my makeup and sunscreen without entirely leaving it 'stripped' or 'tight'. While this is a primarily basic cleanser, I will admit, sometimes the most basic of products actually is one of the best things you can do for your skin. And for that, Skinfix once again hits this one out of the park! Another amazing addition to the Skinfix family!

reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore the SkinFix gel cleanser. Its consistency is slightly more fluid than many gel cleansers on the market, but it generates a rich, luxurious foam that I adore. While the twist cap design is innovative, it tends to leak, causing some product wastage and leaving behind residue on the cap. If only the packaging could be improved, this product would be flawless. Nevertheless, despite this minor inconvenience, the gel cleanser itself deserves a perfect rating of 5 out of 5 stars in my book.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix has been killing it with their barrier+ line, and I'm impressed by every product I've come across. As someone who values skincare routines that prioritize skin health, I was intrigued by the promise of a cleanser that not only cleansed but also nurtured the skin. This particular gel-to-foam cleanser targets the removal of all debris, makeup, and sunscreen while maintaining and protecting the skin barrier.  One of the standout features of this cleanser is its gentle formulation. With no harsh ingredients or fragrance that strip the skin of its natural oils, it instead leaves my skin feeling clean, refreshed, and comfortably hydrated. This gentle approach is especially beneficial for those with sensitive or easily irritated skin, as it helps minimize the risk of inflammation or redness.  I like the innovative design of the cap; however, there's always some product left over every time I use it, which could dry out and clog the opening. The texture of the cleanser is a clear liquid gel, which lathers up beautifully and glides smoothly across the skin, making cleansing feel like a luxurious experience. reviews.review_text: I am a Beauty Content Creator and am lucky enough to test and review numerous products over the years. I generally consider my skin combination, but with the change of season, my skin tends to be oily. So as you read my review, please keep in mind that I tested this Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser, 150 ml, when my skin was in an oily state. This Skinfix cleanser comes in a tube with a twist-off cap. It stands on the cap. The tube is easy to squeeze the product out and retains its shape very well. I have used some cleansers where the tubes do not bounce back, so I have to do a lot of hand-strengthening exercises when I use them, but not this one. This one is easy to dispense. However, I would definitely prefer a flip-off cap. With wet hands, it is not easy to open a twist-off cap, especially when I need to rush through my morning routine with young kids in the house. It contains ceramide and ectoin, so cleansing my face does not have to mean stripping my face. In fact, I have read about ectoin and its lasting moisturizing benefits and it was clear what I read is true. Even though I did not have personal experience using this on dry spots because my skin tends to be oily during spring, I would recommend this to all skin types that want a non-drying daily face cleanser; however, the delivery of the product could be improved. reviews.review_text: I loved the gel texture of the Skinfix Ceramide + Ecotin Gel Cleanser, it is so light and absorbs so well. I am a big fan of the gel consistency and prefer it for the warmer months! The cleanser foams well and I feel my skin clear out after using it. I love the dispensing mechanism, I think the nozzle remains clean if it is dispensed like this! I wouldu2019ve preferred if it had a cap too but this works! Iu2019m glad the scent is neutral so I can use other scented products without worrying about it. I use this as a day cleanser and follow up with the skin fix gel cream and I think it makes a great combination for summer skincare! This might just be my next favourite cleanser!

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser, packaging could be better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is almost the perfect cleanser. What flaws I did find actually involved the packaging not the product.  So, let's get to the good stuff! I love skincare. I have for over a decade. Cleansers in particular can be very hit or miss for me. I suffer dry skin especially on my face and a lot of cleansers irritate that. Skinfix didn't.  This cleanser did an amazing job at removing traces of makeup and spf. It left me feeling clean without being dry or leaving my skin itchy or tight. No scent to speak of. It foams really well.  Now, the bad. It leaks. You have to store it upside down or it will leak everywhere. Not a huge fan of that because if you aren't aware of that fact you can potentially lose a lot of product.  I recommend this to anyone looking for a great all around non irritating cleanser that leaves no residue behind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me tell you, the Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser has been a great addition to my skincare routine! Finding a cleanser that effectively removes makeup, SPF, and excess oils without leaving my skin feeling stripped or irritated has always been a struggle. But this cleanser? It's like a breath of fresh air for my skin.  First off, I love how gentle it is. The gel formula feels incredibly soothing as I massage it into my skin, and it effortlessly lifts away all traces of makeup and sunscreen without any harsh scrubbing required. Plus, it rinses off cleanly without leaving behind any residue, which is a huge bonus for someone like me who hates that tight, dry feeling some cleansers can leave behind.  But what really sets this cleanser apart is its great ingredients including ceramides and ectoin. These two work together to not only cleanse my skin but also to strengthen and protect its natural barrier. It's like giving my skin a little boost of resilience with every wash! And let me tell you, since I started using this cleanser, my skin has never looked better. It's clearer, smoother, and more balanced than I have noticed recently.  I also appreciate the thoughtfulness that went into formulating this product. It's free of harsh chemicals and potential irritants, so I can trust that I'm not doing any harm to my skin.  Overall, I can't recommend the Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser enough. Whether you have sensitive skin or you're just looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser that won't compromise your skin barrier, this is the one for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix - Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser  This cleanser has become one of my favorite products on my everyday day skincare routine. I love using it in the morning for a fresh start with a clean canvas before applying any other product or makeup and at night as my main powerhouse cleanser and spf remover wich I appreciate tremendously because it relieved me of  doing an extensive double cleansing. This is for anyone who likes an amazing and innovative gel cleanser with great consistency and a great lather, leaving your face feeling well cleansed, renewed, moisturized, and soft. It doesn't strip or destroy your  skin barrier. The packaging is extremely cute and sleek, easy to grab, and go for those on the run. Also, it is vegan and cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My previous experience with gel cleansers makes me stay away from them and stick to cream cleansers because gel cleansers give me squeaky and tight skin after cleansing. This is not the case with SkinFix gentle gel cleanser, which does an amazing job with its ceramide and ectoin ingredients . It is lightweight, fragrance free, which is a big deal for me.  I have been using it for about a week now and like it so much. It lathers well, so a little amount is sufficient.  It cleans thoroughly while still being gentle and doesn't strip my skin. It leaves a clean, soft feeling and makes my dull skin look fresh, smooth, hydrated, and healthier.  SkinFix is a clean beauty brand, and this makes me feel at ease that what I put on my face are nonabrasive ingredients. The only thing I donu2019t really like is the Twist Open / Twist Close lid, which could let the gel spill too fast, so make sure you hold tube up when dispensing.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is an incredibly magical gentle yet effective face cleanser! As a major skincare lover who has tried many different skincare products, the Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser really stands out as a great versatile face cleanser that works well for all skin types! I have been testing out this cleanser both in the morning and night. I absolutely love this cleanser!  The Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser is a fragrance free gel to foam cleanser made with ceramides, B-L3 complex which improve natural skin skin barrier, and ectoin which improve skin texture that soothes dry skin! This cleanser had a pleasant gel texture that instantly foamed luxuriously on my skin instantly removing excess sebum, makeup, and even sunscreen! This cleanser left my dull skin instantly soft, supple, and smooth without any harsh stripping of the skin barrier. I loved that this cleanser didnu2019t dry out my skin, didnu2019t irritate my skin, and plumped up my skin with hydration! However, the design of the lid isntu2019t the best! This cleanser has a twist top lid applicator where you twist the lid to open and close the face cleanser which comes out through a small hole in the center of the lid. So, it may be best to open the cleanser while the lip is held up, not facing downwards because some of the cleanser can leak out.  The is a wonderful clean beauty cleanser you can feel good about using that is made without harsh toxic ingredients such as parabens, fragrance, propylene glycol, and phthalates! It is also a cruelty free vegan cleanser!  I highly recommend Skinfix Ceramide + Ectoin Gentle Gel Cleanser because it super gentle on the skin great for everyday use that also helps improve your skinu2019s natural barrier leaving your skin more plump and smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a selfcare-obsessed digital creator who has been in the beauty sphere for over 20 years I'm always on the hunt for the next best skincare product that works for my ageing, dry, sensitive and eczema-prone skin.  I've never met a Skinfix product my skin didn't love.  Skinfix Barrier Ceramides + Ectoin gel cleanser targets dry, dehydrated, dull-looking skin without added Parfum, silicones, PEGs and essentials oils to make caring for my skin as gentle as possible without triggering an allergic reaction.  This cleanser is incredible gentle, lathers up well, removes stubborn makeup thanks to all the beautiful oil ingredients and tackles remnants of sunscreen in one effortless go. Absolutely no need to double cleanse - my evening routine is simplified without cutting corners.   Skinfix's newest gentle cleanser leaves my skin feeling soft, nourished and clean without being squeaky, stripped or tight.   My only slight issue is regarding the design of this container. The tube is sitting on the dispenser and it leaks. Every time I twist the cap on, more product oozes out of the head. To not waste cleanser, I keep the tube standing upside down.  If your skin is hyper reactive or have added-scent sensitivities, have a compromised skin barrier or just dry and looking dull, consider trying Skinfix Barrier+ Ceramides cleanser.

reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  I love this vegan cleanser. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The skinfix ectoin and ceramide gentle gel cleanser is great for sensitive to all different skin types. Itu2019s a gel cleanser that transforms into foam when lathered up. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m quickly becoming a lover of all things Skinfix! This cleanser left my skin feeling soft and clean without feeling stripped. After reading those claims I was excited to have a product that would allow me to only use one cleanser instead of having to double cleanse. Usually, I remove my make up with micellar water on a cotton pad and then go in with my cleanser. I tried this on my face with my make up and sunscreen still intact and it removed most of it, but didnu2019t lather up the same way and didnu2019t leave my skin feeling completely clean. But it works just fine as a second cleanse or a morning cleanser, so I will definitely be adding it into my rotation.
